    source_code: embed

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
data("instacart")
```

Column {data-width=600}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
instacart %>%
  count(order_dow, department) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_dow, y = ~n, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", color = ~department, colors = "viridis"
  )
```

Column {data-width=400}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  sample_n(4000) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~order_hour_of_day, y = ~order_number, type = "box", colors = "viridis"
  )
```

### Chart C

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarise(n_obs = n()) %>% 
  filter(n_obs > 20000) %>% 
  arrange(n_obs) %>% 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~reorder(aisle, -n_obs), y = ~n_obs, type = "bar", colors = "viridis"
  )
```
